text:
Every vote legally cast should be counted. That’s the law

Have no problem with recounts. That’s the law.

But last early votes were cast Sunday & had to be submitted by Tue evening. That the law too. 

Yet 48 hours after deadline #BrowardCounty is only county still counting them

A U.S. Senate seat & a statewide cabinet officer are now potentially in the hands of an elections supervisor with a history of incompetence & of blatant violations of state & federal laws. 

Read Here: https://www.miamiherald.com/news/local/community/broward/article220841135.html 

5/6

#Sayfie

This video,posted by an Independent Cong candidate in 18 (who was endorsed by Bernie Sanders in 16) purports to show BrowardCounty ballots being transported from polling places in private cars.

Has anyone in local media looked into this claim or asked elections dept about it? https://twitter.com/tim_canova/status/1060575611868114944 QT @Tim_Canova Caught On Video: Concerned citizen sees ballots being transported in private vehicles & transferred to rented truck on Election night. This violates all chain of custody requirements for paper ballots. Were the ballots destroyed & replaced by set of fake ballots? Investigate now! http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1060571640894029825/pu/img/Yr6yE4KFyiBmTwNi.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1060571640894029825/pu/vid/320x180/Ah53k1V-H1Pls-6Q.mp4?tag=5

We hyper-focus on politics. So we forget that the biggest impact is made at the community level not government.

Lotus House is an example of that. Read about it here: https://www.miamiherald.com/news/local/community/miami-dade/article221305240.html

National renewal will NOT come from the top down. It will come from the bottom up

According to the South Florida Sun-Sentinel, these two blue bins,circled in the attached picture,hold the ballots that remain to be counted in #BrowardCounty as of 4:20pm this afternoon. Almost 48 hours after the polls closed. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Drg5lGRVsAA8She.jpg

RT @thehill Sanders warns Trump: Interfering with Mueller probe is an "impeachable offense" https://thehill.com/homenews/senate/415606-sanders-warns-trump-interfering-with-mueller-probe-would-be-an-impeachable http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DrbumxhWwAEce6f.png

Late last night, at least 12 people died in a mass shooting in a California bar – including a police officer. My heart goes out to the families of the victims and those wounded. This cannot continue. Congress must move to #EndGunViolence – now.

RT @TerryMcAuliffe For once I agree with the President. I’ve known @NancyPelosi for decades. She is a formidable legislator and the best person for the job. 

https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.washingtonpost.com/amphtml/opinions/trump-is-right-nancy-pelosi-should-be-the-next-speaker/2018/11/07/0add7b6e-e2a7-11e8-8f5f-a55347f48762_story.html

The STATES Act would protect individuals in the “manufacture, production, possession, distribution, dispensation, administration, or delivery” of marijuana from federal prosecution.  https://dailycaller.com/2018/11/07/marijuana-midterms/

Apparently #BrowardCounty elections left behind a box labeled “Provisional Ballots” at a local elementary school that served as a polling place. 

Just let that sink in for a moment. https://twitter.com/marcacaputo/status/1060654559612289024 QT @MarcACaputo In Broward County, Miramar Elementary School teacher Lakeisha Sorey came across a box labeled “Provisional ballots” left behind at the school from Election Day & she’s concerned it might have votes. She didn’t look in the box because she didn’t want to tamper with it http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DrgzsrLX4AEBrAh.jpg

We are not going back to the days when women did not have full access to birth control. When it comes to the rights of women, we cannot go backwards. We have got to go forward. https://thinkprogress.org/trump-administration-rule-birth-control-6c823333b262/

We must stand up and fight for DREAMers and pass a DREAM Act that provides a path towards citizenship for these 800,000 young people. https://www.politico.com/story/2018/11/08/daca-trump-decision-894989
Congress and President Trump must finally have the courage to stand up to the NRA, and do what the American people want – pass common sense gun safety legislation.

While every day gets a little better, we have a long road to recovery ahead of us. My office continues to stand ready to assist Floridians impacted by #HurricaneMichael. Please click the link if you are in need of assistance: https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/casework http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1060602870662393857/pu/img/LUvyoSInr4fT4Opt.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1060602870662393857/pu/vid/320x180/9wgPxTQtz8NruKdS.mp4?tag=5

#Broward supervisor:
- says she doesn’t know how many ballots are left to be counted; &
- Isn’t reporting hourly or regularly,but rather releasing thousands of additional votes,often in the overnight hours,that are chipping away at GOP leads 

2/6 

#Sayfie
I'm thankful for the heroic actions of law enforcement but heartbroken that they lost one of their own. Sgt. Ron Helus rushed into danger to save lives. A true hero.

RT @SenateDems The Trump administration’s new acting Attorney General once outlined a plan to grind the Mueller investigation “to almost a halt.”

That is a clear conflict of interest.

Mr. Whitaker must recuse himself from overseeing the Mueller investigation. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1060574485701632005/img/KJNbksACpSmi-Iv4.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1060574485701632005/vid/320x180/crv7DQXXtLRzbzaP.mp4?tag=8

In this pivotal moment in American history, we must go forward to guarantee health care as a right and not a privilege. Medicare for all is an idea that's time has come. https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2018-11-07/health-politics-turn-to-medicare-for-all-as-obamacare-is-safe

Very proud of the work of my staff & offices after #HuricaneMichael. The most rewarding part of this job is when we are able to help people in need.

Watch Here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PqlbYmsz6RI&feature=youtu.be 

#Sayfie

RT @CecileRichards Couldn’t have put it better than @ktumulty: @NancyPelosi should be the next Speaker of the House because she is extraordinarily good at it. We need her now more than ever to be a check on this administration. https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/trump-is-right-nancy-pelosi-should-be-the-next-speaker/2018/11/07/0add7b6e-e2a7-11e8-8f5f-a55347f48762_story.html

Now democrat lawyers are descending on #Florida. They have been very clear they aren’t here to make sure every vote is counted. 

- They are here to change the results of election; & 
- #Broward is where they plan to do it.

#Sayfie 

4/6

"You never think it's gonna be you until it happens. This is a problem."

No one should ever have to go through this. Period. 
http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dretao6U0AA2F4U.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1060506823621435392/vid/320x180/QpuRx6LYvfZ7xEx0.mp4?tag=8

When did I ask anyone to stop counting? And how is criticizing repeated election failures by same election official a fight to stop vote counting?

Why can’t #BrowardCounty elections do what 65 of 67 counties did, count all votes in timely way & in compliance with #Florida law? https://twitter.com/joenbc/status/1060662440688582657 QT @JoeNBC |@marcorubio is fighting against every citizen’s vote being counted in Florida. #FloridaRecount

Congratulations U.S. Representative-Elect @DrKimSchrier! You answered the call to service and your constituents agreed with your commitment to children’s health and vision for health care, education, and accountability. I look forward to serving with you #ForThePeople.  –NP #WA08 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DrfwPtwUwAAccSJ.jpg

IT'S OFFICIAL: @LucyWins2018 is joining the growing number of fierce common-sense gun safety supporters in the House. Congratulations on a well-fought victory!
https://twitter.com/CNNPolitics/status/1060531374199918592 QT @CNNPolitics BREAKING: Democratic challenger Lucy McBath has defeated Republican Rep. Karen Handel to be elected to Congress in Georgia's 6th Congressional District #CNNElection https://trib.al/G1TYbpc http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DrfDqfQW4AEbvL1.jpg
Further, at a time when too many Americans are harboring homicidal and/or suicidal thoughts, we must greatly improve access to mental health counseling.

I don’t think they should revoke his WH pass. Revoking press access for being rude is a very slippery slope.

But the WH pass is to cover the news,not make yourself the news. This tweet & his behavior is what you expect from an activist,not a journalist. https://twitter.com/acosta/status/1060503703713669121 QT @Acosta Don’t believe the lies coming from the WH. Believe in our freedoms. Thank you all for your support. We won’t back down. 🇺🇸 #1A

This report comes from reporter at South Florida Sun-Sentinel reporting from the #BrowardElections office. https://twitter.com/lbarszewski/status/1060672938771447808 QT @lbarszewski Ooops! Looks like the 205 provisional ballots that were approved  by the Broward elections office and tabulated maybe should have gone to the canvassing board first so they could be challenged by the candidates' reps. Stay tuned.

#Broward election supervisors ongoing violation of #Florida law requiring timely reporting isn’t just annoying incompetence. It has opened the door for lawyers to come here & try to steal a seat in the U.S. Senate & Florida Cabinet
 #Sayfie 

6/6
Congratulations to the 17 #Florida employers selected by @USDOL to receive a HIRE Vets Medallion Award to recognize their leadership in hiring #veterans.  #sayfie

RT @Schriock1 .@nancypelosi is a brilliant person whose campaigning prowess helped secure a House victory earlier this week. The Democratic Party is so lucky to have her. https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/trump-is-right-nancy-pelosi-should-be-the-next-speaker/2018/11/07/0add7b6e-e2a7-11e8-8f5f-a55347f48762_story.html?utm_term=.1e4cc3e818e2

I wanted to take the opportunity to say thank you. You have my word that as your U.S. Senator, I will work tirelessly each and every day to uphold our Constitution and fight for the values we as Texans hold dear: https://www.facebook.com/tedcruzpage/posts/10156658461457464 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Drf9HV2XcAABdjP.jpg

There is no magical or simple solution to the epidemic of gun violence in our country. The mass shooting in Thousand Oaks, California, tells us, however, that we must do everything possible to stop these never-ending tragedies.

My heart goes out to all of the families and victims of last night’s horrific shooting in California where 12 people were killed including a police officer. We are not powerless to stop this carnage. Congress must act to pass common sense gun legislation. https://www.washingtonpost.com/nation/2018/11/08/multiple-injuries-reported-bar-shooting-thousand-oaks-calif/?hpid=hp_rhp-top-table-high_calif-shooting-425am%3Ahomepage%2Fstory-ans&utm_term=.542f7db6796a

#Broward elections department has a history of violating the law: 

A court found they improperly handled votes by mail:
https://www.politico.com/states/florida/story/2018/08/13/judge-sides-with-florida-gop-in-absentee-ballot-dispute-with-broward-county-555553

Court found they destroyed ballots in 2016 in violation of state & federal law:
https://www.politico.com/states/florida/story/2018/05/14/florida-to-monitor-broward-election-chief-after-judge-finds-unlawful-ballot-destruction-in-wasserman-schultz-race-415832 

#Sayfie 

3/6

My heart aches to learn about the horrific shooting in Thousand Oaks on college night. Praying for the injured and the families of those killed who, like so many others, have lost their loved ones to gun violence. Leaders in Congress must act — not some day, but now.

#Florida law requires counties report early voting & vote-by-mail within 30 minutes after polls close. 43 hours after polls closed 2 Democrat strongholds #BrowardCounty & #PalmBeachCounty are still counting & refusing to disclose how many ballots they have left to count. #Sayfie http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DrgK_S9X0AAUQSK.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DrgK_TDWwAAQa7s.jpg

Latest ballots dumped by #Broward &/or #PalmBeach flipped Ag Comm race to Dem & shaved another 4k+ from Scott’s lead in Senate race

Since 3am Wed slow drip from these 2 Dem controlled counties cut Scott lead from 54 to 17K. And they refuse to disclose # of ballots they have left http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DrgOap5XQAAM7s2.jpg

What’s happening in #BrowardCounty happened just last August,albeit on a smaller scale. 

9000 votes arrived in mail just before 7pm Election Day. Few days later incumbent school board member avoids runoff against @rpetty & a judge won by just 400 votes https://cbsloc.al/2C9CJIl#.W-S7sQXapoA.twitter

It's been 12 days since the mass shooting at Tree of Life Synagogue and a few hours since Thousand Oaks. No one should have to live in fear that their community will be the next one struck by gun violence. This isn't normal. Congress' inaction is costing lives. #GunControlNow

I understand some people wondering what the #Sayfie on some of my tweets means. 

No it’s not spanish for #Covefe 

It is a hashtag for a Florida political news aggregator http://SayfieReview.com
There will be more joy in heaven over one sinner who repents than over ninety-nine righteous people who have no need of repentance. Luke 15:7
Let me be absolutely clear: Donald Trump, Brian Kemp and Ron DeSantis ran racist campaigns. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Drf4l9VX4AYaMkQ.jpg
Please share: an emergency hotline has been established for friends and family who are trying to locate loved ones who were at Borderline Bar & Grill in Thousand Oaks — (805) 465-6650

Long but IMPORTANT THREAT ON ELECTIONS IN #FLORIDA.

#BayCounty was hit by a Cat 4 Hurricane just 4 weeks ago,yet managed to count votes & submit timely results.

Yet over 41 hours after polls closed #Broward elections office is still counting votes?  
#Sayfie 

1/6

I’ve seen media bias firsthand. But vast majority of reporters try to be fair & professional. Very few act like Acosta does

He regularly showboats to make himself the story. Instead of reporting the news he wants to be the news

Revoking his WH pass gives him spotlight he craves
